channel.title: Sex and what not
channel.description: so basically right the other thread abotu new years resolutions had some guy saying 16 eyar old virgin ftl and others questioned it, so new thread: how old you were you when you lost it, how many people have you slept with and are you happy you lost it at the age you did or would you prefer to have been older/younger i lost mine when i was 18 and since then ive slept with 3 people and im fine with the age i lost it

item.title: Sex and what not
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Tuggs:

I lost my virginity at 16, and was completely happy with losing it that young. Your virginity isn’t an object that upon losing it, your soul becomes corrupted. No beams of light descend from the heavens and light up the penis and vagina upon penetration. In the end, it’s just a physical act that only means as much as you want it to. I’ve slept with 28 women, and i can honestly say that only three have meant anything.

Liar. I slept with a virgin last night. When she took off her underwear, rays of light shot out from her vagina. At the moment of penetration, that light stopped shining, and god stopped loving her, because she had sex outside of wedlock.

Just kidding. Still zero women. 0Girls1Lothy.

Read full topic
